QuestData.Title: Morbent's Bane
QuestData.Description: <The pieces fit, and the holy artifact is restored, gleaming with sacred light. This should let you defeat Morbent Fel's dark magic.>$B$B<Further down the tunnel, away from the direction you came from, a heinous cackle rings out. It's the clattering laugh of a lich. Morbent Fel is just ahead!>
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Morbent's Bane to weaken Morbent Fel and defeat him.
QuestData.RewardText: May the disgusting monster stay dead this time!$B$BI'll head down there and scatter his remains to ash myself, $n. You've done a great thing; perhaps in time Duskwood can return to its former peaceful state.
